mapper.select: SELECT CAMP_DE_NO, CAMP_NO, CAMP_DE_NAME, CAMP_DE_PRICE, CAPACITY, FULL_CAPACITY, (SELECT (CAMP_DE_IMG_PATH || CAMP_DE_IMG_RENAME) FROM CAMPING_DETAIL_IMG B WHERE A.CAMP_DE_NO = B.CAMP_DE_NO AND CAMP_DE_IMG_ORDER = 0) CAMP_DETAIL_THUMBNAIL FROM "CAMPING_DETAIL" A WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo}

SELECT CAMP_NO, MEMBER_NO, CAMP_ADDRESS, CAMP_PHONE, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_OPTION, CAMP_AROUND_VIEW, CAMP_MAP, MANNER_TIME,CATEGORY, CAMP_INFO, (SELECT (CAMP_IMG_PATH || CAMP_IMG_RENAME) FROM CAMPING_SITE_IMG B WHERE B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND CAMP_IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(COUNTING_STAR), 1) FROM CAMPING_STAR C WHERE C.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO) CAMPING_STAR FROM "CAMPING_SITE" A WHERE CAMP_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CAMP_NO DESC

SELECT CAMP_NO, MEMBER_NO, CAMP_ADDRESS, CAMP_PHONE, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_OPTION, CAMP_AROUND_VIEW, CAMP_MAP, MANNER_TIME,CATEGORY, CAMP_INFO, (SELECT (CAMP_IMG_PATH || CAMP_IMG_RENAME) FROM CAMPING_SITE_IMG B WHERE B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND CAMP_IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(COUNTING_STAR), 1) FROM CAMPING_STAR C WHERE C.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO) CAMPING_STAR FROM "CAMPING_SITE" A WHERE CAMP_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CAMP_NO ASC

SELECT CAMP_NO, MEMBER_NO, CAMP_ADDRESS, CAMP_PHONE, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_OPTION, CAMP_AROUND_VIEW, CAMP_MAP, MANNER_TIME,CATEGORY, CAMP_INFO, (SELECT (CAMP_IMG_PATH || CAMP_IMG_RENAME) FROM CAMPING_SITE_IMG B WHERE B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND CAMP_IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(COUNTING_STAR), 1) FROM CAMPING_STAR C WHERE C.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO) CAMPING_STAR FROM "CAMPING_SITE" A WHERE CAMP_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CAMPING_STAR DESC

SELECT CAMP_NO, MEMBER_NO, CAMP_ADDRESS, CAMP_PHONE, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_OPTION, CAMP_AROUND_VIEW, CAMP_MAP, MANNER_TIME,CATEGORY, CAMP_INFO, (SELECT (CAMP_IMG_PATH || CAMP_IMG_RENAME) FROM CAMPING_SITE_IMG B WHERE B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND CAMP_IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(COUNTING_STAR), 1) FROM CAMPING_STAR C WHERE C.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO) CAMPING_STAR FROM "CAMPING_SITE" A WHERE CAMP_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAMPING_STAR D WHERE D.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO) DESC

SELECT CAMP_NO, MEMBER_NO, CAMP_ADDRESS, CAMP_PHONE, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_OPTION, CAMP_AROUND_VIEW, CAMP_MAP, MANNER_TIME,CATEGORY, CAMP_INFO, (SELECT (CAMP_IMG_PATH || CAMP_IMG_RENAME) FROM CAMPING_SITE_IMG B WHERE B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND CAMP_IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(COUNTING_STAR), 1) FROM CAMPING_STAR C WHERE C.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO) CAMPING_STAR FROM "CAMPING_SITE" A WHERE CAMP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND A.CAMP_ADDRESS || A.CATEGORY || A.CAMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{input} || '%'

SELECT CAMP_NO, MEMBER_NO, CAMP_ADDRESS, CAMP_PHONE, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_OPTION, CAMP_AROUND_VIEW, CAMP_MAP, MANNER_TIME,CATEGORY, CAMP_INFO, (CAMP_IMG_PATH || CAMP_IMG_RENAME) THUMBNAIL, CHECK_IN, CHECK_OUT FROM "CAMPING_SITE" JOIN CAMPING_SITE_IMG USING(CAMP_NO) WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} AND CAMP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND CAMP_IMG_ORDER = 0

SELECT CAMP_DE_NO, CAMP_NO, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_DE_NAME, CAMP_DE_PRICE, CAPACITY, MANNER_TIME, CHECK_IN, CHECK_OUT, FULL_CAPACITY, (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM CAMPING_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY= (SELECT CATEGORY FROM CAMPING_SITE WHERE CAMP_NO = (SELECT CAMP_NO FROM CAMPING_DETAIL WHERE CAMP_DE_NO = #{campDeNo})) ) CATEGORY FROM "CAMPING_DETAIL" JOIN CAMPING_SITE USING(CAMP_NO) WHERE CAMP_DE_NO = #{campDeNo}
SELECT CAMP_DE_IMG_NO, CAMP_DE_NO, CAMP_DE_IMG_PATH, CAMP_DE_IMG_RENAME, CAMP_DE_IMG_ORIGINAL, CAMP_DE_IMG_ORDER FROM "CAMPING_DETAIL_IMG" WHERE CAMP_DE_NO = #{campDeNo}

SELECT CAMP_DE_NO, CAMP_NO, CAMP_DE_NAME, CAMP_DE_PRICE, CAPACITY, CHECK_IN, CHECK_OUT, CAMP_NAME, MANNER_TIME, FULL_CAPACITY, (SELECT (CAMP_DE_IMG_PATH || CAMP_DE_IMG_RENAME) FROM CAMPING_DETAIL_IMG B WHERE A.CAMP_DE_NO = B.CAMP_DE_NO AND CAMP_DE_IMG_ORDER = 0) AS CAMP_DETAIL_THUMBNAIL FROM "CAMPING_DETAIL" A JOIN CAMPING_SITE USING(CAMP_NO) WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} AND CAMP_DE_NO NOT IN ( SELECT CAMP_DE_NO FROM RESERVATIONS WHERE CAMP_ENTDATE < TO_DATE(#{outDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CAMP_OUTDATE > TO_DATE(#{entDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
